JOHN 6.16 iþ swe seiþu warþ, atiddjedun siponjos is ana marein, JOHN 6.17 jah usstigun in skip, iddjedunuh ufar marein in Kafarnaum.
jah riqis juþan warþ jah ni atiddja nauhþan du im Iesus.
JOHN 6.18 iþ marei winda mikilamma waiandin urraisida was.
JOHN 6.19 þaruh farjandans swe spaurde ·k· jah ·e· aiþþau ·l· gasaiƕand Iesu gaggandan ana marein jah neƕa skipa qimandan jah ohtedun sis.
JOHN 6.20 þaruh is qaþ im:
ik im,
ni ogeiþ izwis.
JOHN 6.21 þaruh wildedun ina niman in skip, jah sunsaiw þata skip warþ ana airþai ana þoei eis iddjedun.
JOHN 6.22 iftumin daga managei sei stoþ hindar marein, seƕun þatei skip anþar ni was jainar alja ain, jah þatei miþ-qam-ni-siponjam seinaim Iesus in þata skip, ak ainai siponjos is galiþun.
JOHN 6.23 anþara þan skipa qemun us Tibairiadau neƕa þamma stada, þarei matidedun hlaif, ana þammei awiliudoda frauja.
JOHN 6.24 þaruh þan gasaƕ managei þatei Iesus nist jainar nih siponjos is, gastigun in skipa jah qemun in Kafarnaum sokjandans Iesu.
JOHN 6.25 jah bigetun ina hindar marein qeþunuh du imma:
rabbei, ƕan her qamt?
JOHN 6.26 andhof im Iesus jah qaþ:
amen amen qiþa izwis,
sokeiþ mik, ni þatei seƕuþ taiknins jah fauratanja, ak þatei matideduþ þize hlaibe jah sadai waurþuþ.
JOHN 6.27 waurkjaiþ ni þana mat þana fralusanan, ak mat þana wisandan du libainai aiweinon, þanei sunus mans gibiþ izwis;
þanuh auk atta gasiglida guþ.
JOHN 6.28 þaruh qeþun du imma:
ƕa taujaima, ei waurkjaima waurstwa gudis?
JOHN 6.29 andhof Iesus jah qaþ du im:
þatist waurstw gudis, ei galaubjaiþ þammei insandida jains.
JOHN 6.30 qeþun du imma:
aþþan ƕa taujis þu taikne, ei saiƕaima jah galaubjaima þus?
ƕa waurkeis?
JOHN 6.31 attans unsarai manna matidedun ana auþidai, swaswe ist gameliþ:
hlaif us himina gaf im du matjan.
JOHN 6.32 þaruh qaþ im Iesus:
amen amen qiþa izwis,
ni Moses gaf izwis hlaif us himina, ak atta meins gaf izwis hlaif us himina þana sunjeinan.
JOHN 6.33 sa auk hlaifs gudis ist, saei atstaig us himina jah gaf libain þizai manasedai.
JOHN 6.34 þanuh qeþun du imma:
frauja, framwigis gif unsis þana hlaif.
JOHN 6.35 jah qaþ du im Iesus:
ik im sa hlaifs libainais;
þana gaggandan du mis ni huggreiþ jah þana galaubjandan du mis ni þaurseiþ ƕanhun.
JOHN 6.36 akei qaþ izwis þatei gaseƕuþ mik jah ni galaubeiþ.
JOHN 6.37 all þatei gaf mis atta, du mis qimiþ, jah þana gaggandan du mis ni uswairpa ut;
JOHN 6.38 unte atstaig us himina, nih þeei taujau wiljan meinana, ak wiljan þis sandjandins mik.
... JOHN 6.40 þatuh þan ist wilja þis sandjandins mik, ei ƕazuh saei saiƕiþ þana sunu jah galaubeiþ du imma, aigi libain aiweinon, jah urraisja ina ik in spedistin daga.
JOHN 6.41 birodidedun þan Iudaieis bi ina, unte qaþ:
ik im hlaifs sa atsteigands us himina,
JOHN 6.42 jah qeþun:
niu sa ist Iesus sa sunus Iosefis, þizei weis kunþedum attan jah aiþein?
ƕaiwa nu qiþiþ sa þatei us himina atstaig?
JOHN 6.43 andhof þan Iesus jah qaþ du im:
ni birodeiþ miþ izwis misso.
JOHN 6.44 ni manna mag qiman at mis, nibai atta saei sandida mik atþinsiþ ina, jah ik urraisja ina in þamma spedistin daga.
JOHN 6.45 ist gameliþ ana praufetum:
jah wairþand allai laisidai gudis.
ƕazuh nu sa gahausjands at attin jah ganam gaggiþ du mis.
JOHN 6.46 ni þatei attan seƕi ƕas, nibai saei was fram attin,
sa saƕ attan.
JOHN 6.47 amen amen qiþa izwis:
saei galaubeiþ du mis aih libain aiweinon.
JOHN 6.48 ik im sa hlaifs libainais.
JOHN 6.49 attans izwarai matidedun manna in auþidai jah gaswultun.
JOHN 6.50 sa ist hlaifs saei us himina atstaig, ei saei þis matjai, ni gadauþnai.
